statements: DELETE FROM maintenance_history WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe' AND repair_cost < 1000.00;
DELETE FROM maintenance_history WHERE instrument_id = 101 AND repair_date = '2023-01-15';
DELETE FROM maintenance_history WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe' AND repair_cost > 5000;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE instrument_id = 500 AND maintenance_type = 'Regular Maintenance';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_id = 100 AND instrument_id = 50;
DELETE FROM InstrumentRepair WHERE repair_date < '2022-01-01' AND repair_type = 'Major Overhaul';
DELETE FROM Instruments WHERE instrument_id = (SELECT instrument_id FROM Repairs WHERE repair_id = 20);
